name: Drink To The ground
description:
You just had a graduation party with your relatives and family, but soon things will go crazy with your friends! Your friends have challenged you to buy and drink 50 drinks. Knock out other people inside or outside of the bar to get money to buy drinks. Do you have what it takes?

This game is made by SuomiRatchet and was made for my big brother's graduate thing. This game is a joke and is not meant to be taken seriously.

Drink To The Ground is a game about drinking and spending money in a Saturday night. Also, you should note that the game is NOT FINISHED and will get updates every once a while. The game is missing these next things: Music, sound effects, backgrounds and a good developer.
